alert.note: Alert for Marinette; Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:57PM CDT until May 12 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Marinette County in northeastern Wisconsin... Northern Oconto County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mountain, or 30 miles north of Shawano, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mountain, Bear Paw Scout Camp, Middle Inlet, Silver Cliff, Caldron Falls Rese, Caldron Falls Reservoir, Governor Thompson State Park, Crooked Lake and High Falls Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
